Open the Donations screen from Home. You\'ll see bank account details with copy buttons for the account number and branch code.
Open the Events screen from the bottom navigation. The Home screen also highlights the next upcoming event.
Go to the Bookings screen from bottom navigation. Enter details (event/service, date, time, contact) and submit.
Pending means your booking request is waiting for admin review. You\'ll see an admin message after it is reviewed.
Open the Documents screen. Use \"Upload Document\" for PDFs/Docs or \"Upload to Gallery\" for images/videos. Gallery uploads need a description and appear publicly after admin approval.
Gallery uploads are reviewed by an admin. Once approved, they appear in the Gallery and may be shown on Home as previews.
Common images (JPG/PNG/GIF/BMP), videos (MP4/AVI/MOV), PDFs and Word documents are supported. Others may upload as \"other\".
Go to Settings and toggle the Theme switch. The app will recreate to apply the new theme.
Open Settings and tap \"Update Account\" to change your name and phone number.
In Settings, tap \"My Uploads & Status\" to see your items and their approval status.
In Settings, tap \"My Event Requests (Pending)\" to view your pending requests.
Open Settings and tap \"Logout\". This clears your session and returns to the login screen.
The app caches data for offline use. Ensure you\'re online and revisit the screen to refresh. If needed, close and reopen the app.
From Home, tap the Gallery card. Approved community media and temple photos appear there.
Open the Documents screen to browse or upload documents. Some documents may be tied to events.
Use the Help button in Settings for FAQs. For additional assistance, please speak to the temple office staff.
Only admin users can access the Admin Panel. Regular users won\'t see admin options.
On the Home screen, tap \"Visit Website\" to open the site in your browser.
Donations are via bank transfer using the details on the Donations screen. Use the copy icons for quick copying.
Yes. MP4/AVI/MOV are supported. After upload, an admin reviews before it appears publicly.
Yes. Login is required to access events, documents, gallery, bookings, and donations.
